item.title: Safety Net or Fragile Barrier? XRP Price takes Support at $0.5
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
In response to the increasing bearish momentum in the crypto market, the XRP price has witnessed aggressive correction for over a month. From the last swing top of $0.938, the coin price plummets 46.4% to reach the current trading price of the $0.504 mark. Amid this downfall, the coin price has recently breached the $0.563

The post Safety Net or Fragile Barrier? XRP Price takes Support at $0.5 appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Terra Luna Classic Community Turns Down USTC Repeg Team Proposal; LUNC Burn Rises
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The Terra Luna Classic community has turned down the community pool spend proposal to fund the USTC Quant team for the second month. The proposal has failed to receive minimum votes and received “No with veto” votes from the community members instead. According to the latest voting details, Proposal 11716 “USTC / Stable Algo Quant

The post Terra Luna Classic Community Turns Down USTC Repeg Team Proposal; LUNC Burn Rises appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Will BTC Price Extend Correction Trend below $27000?
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
On August 17th, the cryptocurrency market encountered a substantial wave of selling with Bitcoin leading the downward charge. This notable sell-off was triggered by SpaceX’s announcement to divest its Bitcoin holdings, effectively magnifying the selling pressure across the crypto landscape. Thus, the BTC price showcased a 7% intraday loss leading to a breakdown below the

The post Will BTC Price Extend Correction Trend below $27000? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Shiba Inu Lead Developer Promises Scaling Shibarium By 1500%
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu lead developer Shytoshi Kusama on Saturday published a second update regarding Shibarium network status and its scaling. Shytoshi Kusama weighs in on preparing the Layer-2 chain for massive traffic, scaling, and decentralization after internal testing. Shiba Inu ecosystem tokens SHIB and LEASH prices have jumped again. item.description:

item.title: Breaking: SEC Files Motion for Leave in Interlocutory Appeal in Ripple Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Munene Murithi
item.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has formally requested an expedited appeal in response to Judge Analisa Torres’ decision on Ripple Labs’ XRP token. Contrary to recent speculation, the SEC will not appeal the decision that XRP is not a security. 🚨NEW: The @SECGov has officially filed its motion for leave to file an

The post Breaking: SEC Files Motion for Leave in Interlocutory Appeal in Ripple Lawsuit appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has formally requested an expedited appeal in response to Judge Analisa Torres’ decision on Ripple Labs’ XRP token. item.title: Grayscale Vs SEC Verdict Delayed for Second Time
item.dc:creator: Sunil Sharma
item.description:
The crypto world waits with bated breath as the DC Court of Appeals once again postpones its decision in Grayscale vs. SEC, a lawsuit that holds the potential to reshape the cryptocurrency market. item.title: SOL Price Analysis: Solana Poised for 12% Drop As Buyers Lost Crucial Support
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
During the first half of August, the Solana buyers tried to hold above the combined support of $22.4 and 50% Fibonacci retracement. However, from the latter half, this SOL Price witnessed aggressive selling pressure leading to a breakdown of the aforementioned support. This crackdown signals the continuation of the ongoing correction phase. Should you sell

item.title: “We Only Hold”- Binance CEO Bans Futures Trading for Employees
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Munene Murithi
item.description:
​​Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao aka CZ, has set the bar high for transparency in the crypto world. Significantly, CZ has ushered in a robust policy that all Binance staff, including him, are now barred from futures trading. Binance Zero-Tolerance on Policy Violations The announcement surfaced on Twitter, “Binance employees (including me) are prohibited from futures trading.

The post “We Only Hold”- Binance CEO Bans Futures Trading for Employees appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Scam Alert: Hackers Drains Exactly Protocol of 4300 ETH
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
In an unexpected turn of events, the Exactly Protocol, a Decentralized Finance (DeFi) project built on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain, has been hacked, resulting in the loss of 4300 ETH. Crypto research firm Messari stated that the hack resulted in a loss approximated at $7.3 million, highlighting the pressing need for heightened security measures in

The post Scam Alert: Hackers Drains Exactly Protocol of 4300 ETH appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
In an unexpected turn of events, the Exactly Protocol, a Decentralized Finance (DeFi) project built on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain, has been hacked, resulting in the loss of 4300 ETH. Crypto research firm Messari stated that the hack resulted in a loss approximated at $7.3 million, highlighting the pressing need for heightened security measures in

The post Scam Alert: Hackers Drains Exactly Protocol of 4300 ETH appeared first on CoinGape.
